Title: Redu
Writer: Sanjay Navgire (original screenplay and dialogue), Chinmay Patankar (adaptation), Chinmay Patankar (additional dialogue), Sagar Vanjari (additional screenplay), Sagar Vanjari
Actors: Vinamra Babhal, Chhaya Kadam, Gouri Konge, Shashank Shende
Plot: REDU is a story of TATU and his family, set in the mid 1970's. Tatu, a short tempered, irate middle-aged man living in a small village, is fascinated and curious to see a radio, a small ...
